articles.title: The value gap from AI investments is widening dangerously fast
articles.summary: Boston Consulting Group (BCG) has found a widening chasm separating an elite of AI masters from the majority of firms struggling to generate any value from their AI investments.  A study from BCG foun.
articles.content: Boston Consulting Group (BCG) has found a widening chasm separating an elite of AI masters from the majority of firms struggling to generate any value from their AI investments. articles.title: California Governor Newsom signs landmark AI safety bill SB 53
